summary: Pankow  is one of the new borough of Berlin.
full_text:
Prenzlauer Berg is a locality of Berlin, forming the southern part of the borough of Pankow.
Until 2001, Prenzlauer Berg was itself a borough of Berlin; in that year it was merged  into the borough of Pankow.
After German reunification in 1990, Prenzlauer Berg became a centre for the more bohemian Berlin youth, while more recently it has experienced gentrification.
title: Prenzlauer Berg
